text:
Hi, Everyone, does anyone know how to lookup the two following events ( email ) from HubSpot via the API ( UNSUBSCR
IBE and EMAIL HARD BOUNCE ) preferably using a date range?
Is there a way to display blog tags on the search results page?

It’s 2024 and I still can’t figure out the node SDK and <https://github.HubSpot.com/HubSpot-api-nodejs/index.html|its vague autogenerated docs>. Why does the sdk exist if we can’t use it? It’s nothing but a source of confusion and frustration for developers entering the ecosystem imo. Or maybe I’m just dumb

For example, what the heck does <https://github.HubSpot.com/HubSpot-api-nodejs/classes/crm_objects.AssociationSpec.html|this >`objects.associationsSpec`<https://github.HubSpot.com/HubSpot-api-nodejs/classes/crm_objects.AssociationSpec.html| do >and how do we use it? Why does the doc overview give me instructions on HubSpot properties?
I gave up using these sdk, they're either bad documented or actually doesn't work in some cases (associations apis are soooo bugged)

exactly. i guess where my frustration lies is that its 2024 and still nothing has been done, yet HubSpot tries to push it in workflows and code examples.

So new developers come in, have a terrible experience, and the ecosystem suffers for it
If we’re talking about under-rated leaks in the HubSpot boat, the sdk is highly significant

While we don’t have specific and searchable docs for the SDKs, we at least do have examples of each endpoint utilizing the SDKs.

It is only fair to give credit where credit is due
I find it better to look at the actual code instead of the documentation
